About Me

If you want to get to know me, read on...

BIO

I am a software developer with two years experience in Software and Web Development. I have proven experience as a front-end developer on various projects. I understand the lifecycle of web development, and as a developer, I am included in all phases when working on a project. I can easily understand client's needs and deliver results based on them. My productivity is based on learning, motivation, and teamwork. I am not limited to certain frameworks or paradigm, I am flexible and open to new challenges. I am currently working as a Lead Architect at Mission Automate.

Mission Automate

Lead Architect

I first started at Mission Automate as a programming intern, which quickly lead to further collaboration and extension of knowledge, skills and abilities.

I was a part of Apprenticeship system, which is when I developed a sense of teaching and sharing my knowledge with others.

Being promoted to Lead Developer gave me more confidence and motivation to continue doing what I love. Today as a Lead Architect, I am still continuously learning and adapting new skills, so that I can better contribute to the quality of software solutions that are essential in every successful business.

Forest Creations

Lead Developer

Forest Creations is a project of designing a website for a jewelry designer in Slunj, Croatia.

As a developer, I was provided with the website mockups and color palletes that were a starting point in developing.

During the process, I have learned that communication and engagement of each person working on the project (including the owner of the project) are crucial and essential aspects that help in bringing the best results.

East West Consolidated

Software Developer

I have worked on developing a simple calendar application for East West Consolidated company.

The application provides a customer with a simple, intuitive interface for keeping track of their orders.

I keep maintaining and adding new features to the application, as per requests coming from the client.

Foundation

Software Developer

This is one of my first projects at Mission Automate. The job was to automate ordering process for the Foundation employees. This is the first time I encountered automation tools such as Selenium, and learned to work with them. Tools used: Python, Selenium.
